channel.title: Purdue University Case Study: Radix DLT
channel.description:
A fairly positive review and analysis of Radix has been published by 'Boiler Blockchain' - Purdue University's blockchain innovation hub. Read the full analysis here:
[Industry Case Study: Radix Distributed Ledger Technology](https://medium.com/coinmonks/industry-case-study-radix-distributed-ledger-technology-74d3a0c78b1)
